pages.title: Gold Ore
pages.text: $(l)Depth: y = 0 - 32$()$(br2)Iron ore veins occurs in the same distribution as in vanilla minecraft. However, gold ore veins frequently contain silver ore in addition to gold ores.

pages.title: Mesa Gold
pages.text: $(l)Depth: y = 32 - 80$()$(br2)Gold ore can also be found near the surface of mesa biomes, just like in vanilla minecraft.

pages.title: Alluvial Gold
pages.text: $(l)Depth: y = 0 - 80$()$(br2)Gold ore can be found mixed in with gravel, as an alluvial placer deposit. You can expect to find roughly 1 gold ore in 2000 gravel blocks. For more information on gravel ores, consult the relevant chapters of the guide.
